note.p: Landowner. Of the Waterfoot, Pettigo, county Fermanagh, Ireland. JP for county Fermanagh and Donegal and a deputy lieutenant of county Fermanagh.
Census returns of Ireland 1901 (www.census.nationalarchives.ie/reels/nai000776710/, accessed 9 February 2017), 1911 (www.census.nationalarchives.ie/reels/nai002338236/)
Ireland, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1922 (www.willcalendars.nationalarchives.ie, accessed 9 February 2017)
